sentences.english: Pemphigus is an uncommon autoimmune skin disease.
sentences.chinese: 天皰瘡是一種罕見的自身免疫性皮膚病。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of pemphigus IgG subclasses in the pathogenesis of pemphigus.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解天皰瘡抗體亞類在天皰瘡發病中的作用。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the role of pemphigus IgG subclasses in the pathogenesis of pemphigus.
sentences.chinese: 目的瞭解天皰瘡抗體亞類在天皰瘡發病中的作用。

sentences.english: The diagnosis of paraneoplastic pemphigus was then made.
sentences.chinese: 診斷爲副腫瘤性天皰瘡。

sentences.english: This paper reports the results of direct immunofluorescence( DIF) test in10 patients with pemphigus.
sentences.chinese: 本文報道10例天皰瘡患者的直接免疫熒光檢查結果。

sentences.english: The level of pemphigus antibody decreased.
Conclusions The therapeutic effect of pemphigus has been improved by evidence-based treatment.
sentences.chinese: 結論循證治療天皰瘡患者可有效提高療效。

sentences.english: Methods Clinical Data of 7 cases herpetiform pemphigus were retrospectively analyzed.
sentences.chinese: 方法回顧性分析7例皰疹樣天皰瘡臨牀資料。

sentences.english: Pemphigus is a group of severely autoimmunitive bullous diseases with long course of disease and bad prognosis.
sentences.chinese: 天皰瘡是一組潛在致命性的自身免疫性大皰性皮膚病。
